short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable copying on websites with copy protection: enable right-click and restore context menu functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
